OR (CODE_ID = 'S02' AND DEPT_ID = (SELECT DEPT_ID FROM EMP WHERE EMP_ID = #{schedule_Writer_Id}) )
OR (CODE_ID = 'S03' AND dept_id = (SELECT dept_id FROM EMP WHERE EMP_ID = #{schedule_Writer_Id}) ) )
